practice_phrases: You're like that.
你像那。
I think you're like that.
我认为你像那。
You're like your idea.
你像你的主意。
I believe you're like that too.
我相信你也像那。
You're like how it's going.
你像它的进展。
It's interesting that you're like something better.
你像一些事情更好这很有趣。
You're like what I thought before you leave.
你像在你离开前我认为的。
I feel that you're like when we were in the pub.
我感觉你像我们在酒吧时。
Can I ask you something? You're like your car.
我能问你一些事情吗？你像你的车。
I'm starting to feel that you're like a good idea.
我开始感觉你像个好主意。
Can I ask someone?
我能问某个人吗？
I wanted to see someone.
我想见某个人。
I think someone is better.
我认为某个人更好。
You're like someone interesting.
你像某个人有趣。
I believe someone has a good idea.
我相信某个人有个好主意。
Someone you like is leaving.
你喜欢的某个人在离开。
I feel better when someone is in the pub.
我感觉更好当某个人在酒吧时。
That isn't why I wanted to see someone before.
那不是为什么我以前想见某个人。
It's starting to feel easier when someone asks you something.
它开始感觉更容易当某个人问你一些事情时。
I'm definitely excited that someone you're like is very good.
我绝对兴奋你像的某个人非常好。
I used to know that.
我以前认识那。
You used to know something.
你以前认识一些事情。
I think you used to know.
我认为你以前认识。
I used to know your idea.
我以前认识你的主意。
I believe someone used to know better.
我相信某个人以前认识更好。
You're like someone you used to know.
你像你以前认识的某个人。
Can I ask you something you used to know before you leave?
在你离开前我能问你你以前认识的一些事情吗？
I feel better than when I used to know in the pub.
我感觉比我在酒吧时以前认识的更好。
It's interesting that you used to know how it's going.
你以前认识它的进展这很有趣。
That isn't why you're like someone I used to know.
那不是为什么你像我以前认识的某个人。
That's what I used to know.
那是我以前认识的。
Something I used to know is interesting.
我以前认识的一些事情很有趣。
I think that I used to know better.
我认为我以前认识的更好。
You're like someone I used to know.
你像我以前认识的某个人。
I believe your idea is what I used to know.
我相信你的主意是我以前认识的。
Can I ask you about what I used to know?
我能问你关于我以前认识的吗？
I feel better because of someone I used to know in the pub.
我感觉更好因为我在酒吧以前认识的某个人。
That isn't why I wanted to see what I used to know.
那不是为什么我想见我以前认识的。
It's starting to feel easier with someone I used to know before you leave.
它开始感觉更容易和我以前认识的某个人在你离开前。
I'm definitely excited about how someone I used to know is doing.
我绝对兴奋关于我以前认识的某个人在做。
That's someone I used to know.
那是我以前认识的某个人。
I think about someone I used to know.
我认为关于我以前认识的某个人。
I wanted to see someone I used to know.
我想见我以前认识的某个人。
I believe that's someone I used to know better.
我相信那是我以前认识的某个人更好。
You're like someone I used to know in the pub.
你像我在酒吧以前认识的某个人。
Can I ask you about someone I used to know?
我能问你关于我以前认识的某个人吗？
I feel better when I think about someone I used to know.
我感觉更好当我想关于我以前认识的某个人时。
It's interesting that you're like someone I used to know before you leave.
你像我在你离开前以前认识的某个人这很有趣。
That isn't why I'm excited about someone I used to know.
那不是为什么我兴奋关于我以前认识的某个人。
You're like someone I used to know.
你像我以前认识的某个人。
